name: BunTure
description:
Cake em all!

99.9% players fails at the first try

Bunture (Bunny Adventure) is a simple adventure game where the player take role as a bunny that wants to get the giant cake. The giant cake is somehow hidden in the last stage.

But you need to be careful as bunny has only one chance to defeat  numerous challenge and traps to pass every level. So, beware of your steps as they will always have consequences.

Features:

- The game has 5 levels and each level has increasing difficulties.
- You can collect coins that shattered accross the level and the coin will be displayed at the user interface. 
- Have in game music that encourage player

How to play : 

- Up Arrow to Jump
- Left Arrow to Run to the left
- Right Arrow to Run to the right

Play and become the 0.01%.

Game's source gitlab :

https://gitlab.com/shafiraishlah51/1-week-game-jam.git
